page.title: 16ORGANIZED LEISURE 3
page.content: We asked 340 children (ages 7 to 11) from Highfield School about regular leisure activities they attended. {************************************* {*}Youth clubs....................47{*{ {*}Swimming lessons or clubs......48{* {*}Martial arts training..........15{* {*}Gymnastics.....................18{* {*}Football.......................29{* {*}Brownies or Guides.............38{* {*}Cubs or Scouts.................22{* {*}Dance lessons..................36{* {*}Disco..........................49{* {*}Roller disco...................49{* {*}Other regular activities.......87{* {*}None at all....................61{* {*************************************} Other regular activities included sea cadets,boys/girls brigade,fishing, boxing,music lessons,majorette troops, drama club,red cross,horse riding and tennis.{By Suzanne Jones age 10
